Posts.EditableText:
I have problems with some of my timers.
Timer should kill player after 10 sec if player doesn't interact with the object that disables the timer.

But when player presses "Continue" (activating the timer). Timer doesn't wait and kill him before 10 seconds.
Posts.HTML:
I have problems with some of my timers.
Timer should kill player after 10 sec if player doesn't interact with the object that disables the timer.

But when player presses "Continue" (activating the timer). Timer doesn't wait and kill him before 10 seconds.
